Description: Summon a gust of wind carrying embers to scorch and disorient enemies.
Create a spinning vortex of flames that moves through the battlefield.
Call forth a powerful windstorm filled with searing heat.
Surround an area with swirling winds of embers, igniting anything within.
Unleash a large whirlwind of fire, incinerating everything in its path.
Summon a tornado of fire that draws in and burns enemies.
Create a hot desert wind that burns and exhausts all it touches.
Release a blast of hot wind and flames, pushing back and burning enemies.
Envelop yourself in winds and fire, creating a fiery armor that burns melee attackers.
Summon a rush of fiery wind that devastates all in its path.
Summon a swirling vortex of wind shaped like a serpent engulfed in flames.
Create a wind that ignites anything it touches, spreading fire rapidly.
Call forth winds so hot they burn flesh and ignite surroundings.
Summon a strike of wind carrying embers, slicing and burning enemies.
Call upon a storm of solar wind, filled with blinding heat and fire.
Create a massive tornado of fire that moves across the battlefield.
Summon the winds of the underworld, burning and tearing apart everything in their path.
Use wind and fire to launch yourself skyward, leaving a burning trail.
Breathe out a wave of fire carried by the wind, incinerating everything in a wide arc.
Summon a massive vortex of divine flames and wind, scorching all within its reach.
